projects.name: TWEET EMOTION DETECTION
projects.description: The aim of the project was to create a recurrent neural network and train it on a tweet emotion dataset to learn to recognize emotions in tweets. Used a Tokenizer in TensorFlow and then Padded and Truncated Sequences. Created and Trained a Recurrent Neural Network.

projects.name: SUDOKU SOLVER
projects.description: The project aimed to determine which algorithm of the two Crook or Backtracking, is faster. Backend technologies: Flask takes requests from the user to generate sudoku with a userselected a number of missing squares and solve sudoku selected by the user. Frontend technologies: HTML 5, CSS, JavaScript.

projects.name: MASK DETECTION
projects.description: Libraries used: Numpy, OpenCV, matplotlib.pyplot. Downloaded more than a hundred images from the source. Implemented XML classifier using OpenCV, which classifies faces, eyes, and other features. Embedded grayscale so as to easily detect face and other features in the image. Implemented Haarbased feature cascade used for face detection.

experiences.description: Worked on the UI Design and Development part of a fully responsive webpage for a particular section of Desi QnA. Worked on User Verification/Authentication + Engineering challenges of detecting and removing fake bots and posts. Integrated Recaptcha with the website Google Layer of Protection for websites. Tech Stacks: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, MySQL.
Reviewed codes based on Python such as PyTorch, PySpark, data structures and algorithms in Python, and data science.
Authored many articles in the field of Aws including AWS Autoscaling, AWS Cloudtrail, AWS RDS, and others.

full_output.name: Ekta Dua
achievements_and_awards: Got selected for Bertelsmann Scholarship in the year 2020.
